name: Cave Climber (johnbrynte)
description:
A puzzle adventure game about slowly climbing through a cave and collecting treasure. Made for the Metroidvania Month 13 Game Jam. The game is not polished and should be considered as a proof of concept. The trailer is meant to show how I envisioned the game to be.

Controls (keyboard):

Arrow keys - Move around, climb up and down

Z - Use tool

X - Jump

C - Pick up tool

Tab - Switch tool

Joypad should also be supported. Tested with XBOX controller.
